item.title: ETH/BTC 24-hour Change: 9.42%, Current Price: 0.04125
item.description: On August 23rd, based on HTX market data, the exchange rate of ETH to BTC has risen by 9.42% within the past 24 hours. It is currently trading at 0.04125. Over the past 30 days, it has witnessed a 33.81% increase, and in the past 90 days, there has been a 75.23% increase.

item.title: Insider: Trump Ready to Announce Intel Equity Deal on Friday
item.description: August 23rd - According to sources with knowledge of the matter, the Trump administration and Intel (INTC.O) are set to announce the details of an agreement on Friday. Under this agreement, the U.S. government will hold a stake in the chipmaker. The specific details of this arrangement remain unclear. The main focus of the negotiations is to convert the appropriations stipulated in the "Chips for America Act" into the government holding approximately 10% of the company's stock. This transaction is part of the efforts to bolster the struggling company, as President Trump regards the company as crucial to national security.Intel (INTC.O) witnessed a 5.7% increase in its stock price and reached an intraday high. (Golden Finance)

item.title: Trump: Displeased with Progress of Russia-Ukraine Negotiations, Will Make Decision on Russia Issue Within Two Weeks
item.description: On August 23rd, US President Trump stated that he is not content with the progress of the Russia-Ukraine negotiations. The next two weeks will disclose how things will unfold."I may adopt one approach or another regarding the Russia issue. I will give Putin a few weeks. A decision on the Russia issue will be made within two weeks. The decision on Russia is crucial. It could be sanctions, tariffs, or taking no action. If necessary, I may decide to impose sanctions on Russia within two weeks." (Golden Finance)

item.title: 「$125,000 ETH Long Position Liquidated」 Whale's Unrealized Gain Grows to $6.3 Million, Liquidation Price $4,623.97
item.description: On August 23rd, according to on-chain data, the "125k USD ETH Long Liquidation" whale has been continuously augmenting their ETH long position by means of liquidation. Currently, they have an unrealized gain of 6.3 million USD. The opening price is 4,559.41 USD and the liquidation price is 4,623.97 USD.

item.title: US Stock Ethereum Reserve Concept Stocks Soar, SBET and BMNR Both Up Over 15%
item.description: On August 23rd, the Ethereum Reserve Concept Stocks in the US stock market generally experienced a rise. These included:· SharpLink Gaming (SBET.US), which rose by 15.21%;· Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR.US), with a rise of 15.28%;· GameSquare (GAME.US), increasing by 5.75%;· Bit Digital (BTBT.US), rising by 5.51%;· Coinbase (COIN.US), which saw a rise of 6.88%.

item.title: 「Whale Brother」 Ethereum Long Position Hits Over $4.7 Million in Unrealized Gains
item.description: On August 23rd, according to on-chain data, the "Brother Ma" Ethereum long position is currently in a profit of more than $4.7 million, having previously been in a loss of more than $10 million.His HYPE long position has a profit of $250,000, while the YZY long position has a loss of $400,000.

item.title: Ethereum Withdrawal Momentum Paused, with CEX Net Inflow of 22,600 ETH in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On August 23rd, based on Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, the total net inflow of ETH on CEX was 22,600 ETH. The top three CEX inflows are as follows:- Kraken, with an inflow of 42,400 ETH.- Binance, with an inflow of 24,100 ETH.- Coinbase Pro, with an inflow of 3226.61 ETH.Moreover, OKX had an outflow of 21,500 ETH and ranked first in the outflow list.

item.title: Ethereum Only Needs to Rise 1% More to Hit an All-Time High
item.description: On August 23rd, with the continuous rise of the crypto market, Ethereum only needs to increase by another 1% to break through the all-time high set in November 2021 ($4868).

item.title: 「ETH Ecosystem」 Altcoins See Broad Gains, ETHFI Surges Over 22% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 23rd, according to HTX market data, the "ETH Ecosystem" altcoins witnessed a collective rise. These include:ETHFI surged by more than 22% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.295;ETC surged by more than 20% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $25.00;ENA surged by more than 19% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.7365;SSV surged by more than 18% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $9.88;ARB surged by more than 18% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.5755;EIGEN surged by more than 16% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.493;LDO surged by more than 15% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.464;ENS surged by more than 14% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $27.84.

item.title: Apple is exploring using Gemini AI to support the new version of Siri, with Claude and ChatGPT also under consideration.
item.description: August 23rd: According to market reports, Apple is looking into the utilization of Google's Gemini AI to provide support for the new version of Siri. However, it has not excluded the possibility of continuing to use its own Siri AI model. It is also giving consideration to Anthropic (Claude) and OpenAI (ChatGPT) for the new version of Siri. (Golden Finance)
